H0.text: Which British TV series starring John Simm as DCI Sam Tyler and Philip Glenister as DCI Gene Hunt was remade in the USA starring Jason O'Mara and Harvey Keitel. Life on Mars

H1.text: Which British TV series starring John Simm as DCI Sam Tyler and Philip Glenister as DCI Gene Hunt was remade in the USA starring Jason O'Mara and Harvey Keitel. Ashes to Ashes

H2.text: Which British TV series starring John Simm as DCI Sam Tyler and Philip Glenister as DCI Gene Hunt was remade in the USA starring Jason O'Mara and Harvey Keitel. Inspector Morse

H3.text: Which British TV series starring John Simm as DCI Sam Tyler and Philip Glenister as DCI Gene Hunt was remade in the USA starring Jason O'Mara and Harvey Keitel. Mars life

A4.text: Life on Mars is an adaptation of the original British series of the same title produced for the BBC.

A5.text: Life on Mars is an American crime drama television series which originally aired on ABC from October 9, 2008 to April 1, 2009.
